softwareUpdatePendingDescription: Hark, we have an update for your Jouling pleasure! This will take only a few minutes, but you can’t use Joule until it’s complete.
softwareUpdateSuccessDescription: That wasn’t so bad, was it? Please return to your previously scheduled cooking.
firmwareUpdateSuccessDescription: Firmware update has been applied successfully. Enjoy!
firmwareUpdateFailedDescription: Well, this is awkward—the update didn’t work. Joule will restart to clean up after itself. Please try again once the app reconnects.
firmwareUpdateWhileCooking: Sorry, the firmware can’t be updated while Joule is at work. Please try again when you’re done cooking.
firmwareUpdatePreUpdateDescription: The update will take a few minutes, and you won’t be able to use Joule while it’s happening. Please keep this device close to Joule throughout the update.
firmwareUpdateWifiRequiredDescription: To apply this update, connect Joule to WiFi.
firmwareUpdateCannotDownloadManifestDesc: We had trouble checking for updates. Please make sure you are connected to the internet and try again.
doNotBackgroundApp: Please don’t background or pause the app while the update is being applied.
noUpdatesAvailable: You’re all up on your updates!
cannotAccessTftpServerDescription: Joule can’t connect to our server to fetch that firmware update. Please check your router settings.
firmwareUpdateWifiProblemsDescription: Joule can’t connect to the internet. Set up WiFi again?
firmwareUpdateNotConnectedBody: You need to be connected to Joule to update the firmware. Try reconnecting.
